locations.name: Moremi Game Reserve (Mobile Camp Area)
locations.description: Overnighting in mobile camps within Moremi, renowned for its stunning landscapes where dry savannah meets Okavango Delta wetlands, offering rich biodiversity including big cats and wild dogs.

locations.name: Khwai Community Concession (Mobile Camp Area)
locations.description: Staying in mobile camps within the Khwai Concession, famous for predator sightings along the Khwai River and offering an exclusive, immersive bush experience under the stars.

locations.name: Chobe National Park (Riverfront Area)
locations.description: Accommodation likely near or within the Chobe Riverfront area, famed for hosting the world's largest concentration of elephants and offering spectacular wildlife viewing, especially via boat cruises.
